item.title: Goodbye Gatsby, Hello Hugo
item.description: I Switched to Hugo This blog used to use Gatsby. Now it uses Hugo. What I like about Hugo Themes Hugo has an open ecosystem of really well-written and maintained themes. At the time of writing, I’m using paper. I also like the model of overriding theme files by creating files in the static and assets directories. For the most part, I find this model of extensibility is intuitive. The paper theme also uses Tailwind CSS, and I like that I can use Tailwind classes out-of-the-box.
